Title.Language: Adam Psali on "You are Called" (Come, O you people...)

Text.Language: Amwini nilaoc: n~ten ]wou m~Pi,~rictoc: nem ]yeo~tokoc: Maria~ ]paryenoc.
Come, O you people / To glorify Christ / And the Theotokos / Mary the Virgin.
